title: Add configurable data retention policies for ingested conversations and issue artifacts

sections.text: Implement retention policy configuration (per workspace) for raw support conversations, extracted issue evidence, and derived metadata stored in Issue_Tracker. Add background cleanup jobs to enforce TTLs (delete/expire data) while preserving required minimal references for linked downstream tickets. Expose retention settings in admin UI and API, including defaults and validation to prevent non-compliant indefinite storage.
